attributes.background: Swegways are safer than mobility scooters and slower also swegways arent legal but electric bikes are theyre more dangerous as they go faster and your more likely to hit someone on a bike than a swegway.

rejection.details:
Sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/164006
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
